name: qianshe-archive
description: 谦舍个人博客与作品集系统 - Monorepo

scripts.build:all: pnpm -r --filter './packages/*-frontend' run build && pnpm -r --filter './packages/*-worker' run build
scripts.build:portfolio: pnpm --filter portfolio-frontend run build && pnpm --filter portfolio-worker run build
scripts.build:dashboard: pnpm --filter dashboard-frontend run build && pnpm --filter dashboard-worker run build
scripts.deploy:portfolio: cd packages/portfolio-worker && npx wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.deploy:dashboard: cd packages/dashboard-worker && npx wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.migrate: cd database && npx wrangler d1 execute qianshe-db --file=migrations/001_initial_data.sql
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rm -rf dist build static node_modules
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint:all && npm run type-check-all && npm run test
scripts.quality-check: npm run lint:all && npm run type-check-all && npm run build:check && npm run test

author: qainshe
